general.gigTitle: design and develop your custom webflow website

sellerCard.description:
Hi! I’m Marten, fluent in both 🇩🇪 and 🇬🇧🇺🇸, and I’m all about providing value to value minded people. My clients range from individuals to startups, all the way to NFL teams.

I’ve been working with websites for over 8 years. As the founder of Into Place Design, today I lead a dedicated team of 7 professionals from my hometown Berlin, Germany.

For reference: In just the last six months, we’ve provided more than 45 custom projects for clients across the DACH region, Europe, and North America. 

Shoot me a message and lets see if we're a good fit!

description.content:
Hi! Im Marten, fluent in both English and German, and Im all about providing value to value-minded people. My partner and I form a dedicated Webflow design and development team with over 8 years of experience. Weve launched 50+ Webflow sites for impressive clients, like the NFL or clients associated with Lufthansa and Payoneer.


Our Webflow services include:


  1. Converting Adobe XD or Figma designs to Webflow
  2. Crafting tailor-made Webflow solutions
  3. Implementing engaging 3D animations and Webflow micro-interactions
  4. SEO optimizing your site so Google loves it
  5. Seamlessly setting up Webflow CMS, or migrating from platforms like WordPress, Wix, Squarespace, React, etc.
  6. Building multi-language sites with Weglot, prioritizing site speed and SEO
  7. Leveraging Airtable, Three JS, GSAP, WebGL, Lottie, and AI integrations


We also establish payment systems, booking functionality, and subscriptions using Memberstack, offering unwavering support based on Finswee

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you develop your websites 100% yourselves?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! And we create each website from the ground up for our clients' needs!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I edit or expand the webiste myself?
Do you accept my project now?
Do you optimise for SEO needs?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! Our designed websites are completely responsive and finely tuned for SEO optimization. However, we can provide On-page and Off-page, Technical SEO, Weglot, Speed optimization, mobile SEO, backlinks and Core vitals.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I have a large or complex project and am unsure on where to begin
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Send me a message and we'll clear the fog. You'll hear the right questions and can get a professional perspective on how to solve your problem. If we see we're a great fit to work together, perfect. If not, that's okay as well and you can take our insights and find another way to implement them :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: What should I provide before starting an order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Kindly gather all your assets, such as copywriting, branding elements, contact details, images, social media links, icons, videos, or animation models, and organize them within a designated Google Drive folder. Additionally, please furnish references and links to your competitors' websites to serve

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you ensure the quality of a site and do QA?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
(1) We double confirm everything from spacing, typography, SEO, assets, meta descriptions, meta tags, etc. 
(2) The client confirms whether the Webflow implementation matches the original Figma file.
(3) The client and me both manually run a detailed testing about every aspect of the site.

reviews.comment:
What I missed with so many freelancers is their effort to truly understand my situation and provide meaningful advice. Marten takes the time to listen and understand your business and audience, so he can give tailored, valuable guidance for your website. I’ve wasted enough money on people who were either half as skilled or half as invested as Marten and his team. Best regards to all of them—I’m a happy, recurring customer!
If you’re tired of the “buy cheap, buy twice” experience and want the job done right, message Marten. Highly recommended!

seller_response.comment: Thanks, Kirat! I’m really glad I was able to understand your case well (and it was a pleasure working with someone as pleasant as you ;) Take good care!

reviews.comment: Marten was quick to help when we needed to add a few details to the website we built together. Still highly recommend him!
Marten replied quick and we worked on a great design
As usual another great work from Marten. Thank you

Marten responded quickly, and we had a productive session discussing our design and user flow. It’s clear that he prioritizes end-user value over simply trying to sell more pages, which I really appreciate. We’ve only had a brief session so far, as I need to address a few things internally before we move forward, but it was an excellent call. I got exactly what I needed and more.

notableClients.name: NFL
notableClients.interaction_description: We designed and developed two websites for the Houston Texans NFL team. The sites were explaining and announcing the first brand redesign in team history. A great opportunity to provide value to the Houston Texans NFL team and their dedicated fans!

enriched_details.name: NFL
enriched_details.description: The National Football League is a professional American football league consisting of 32 teams, divided equally between the National Football Conference and the American Football Conference.
